# subtitleTextAttributes

**Instance Property**

The default text attributes to apply to the subtitle rendered in the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subtitleTextAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any] { get set }
```

## Configuring the subtitle

- **largeSubtitleTextAttributes**: The default text attributes to apply to the subtitle when it’s rendered under the large title.
